LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_ImprovisedSpear.label: Improvised Spear
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_ImprovisedSpear.description: The Improvised spear is infamous for its reliabilty, lethality, abundancy and its common use among Greytiders.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Welder.label: Welder
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Welder.description: The Welder is known for its extensive utility and efficiency at melting faces off.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Welder.tools.0.label: flame
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Screwdriver.label: Screwdriver
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Screwdriver.description: Apply to eyes for maximum effectivenes
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Screwdriver.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Screwdriver.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe.label: Pickaxe
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe.description: Standard Nanotrasen pickaxe, designed for extra picking, the edges and ends are extra pointy and sharp for eradicating filthy xenos or giant space carp.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe.tools.1.label: pick
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Wrench.label: Wrench
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Wrench.description: Great all round tool, wrench a girder, wrench a table, wrench the clown, wrench the head of securities limbs.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Wrench.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Wrench.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Chainsaw.label: Chainsaw
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Chainsaw.tools.0.label: edge
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Toolbox.label: Toolbox
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Toolbox.description: Its full, of the souls of past victims which instill some form of mystical engineering knowledge within the user. It's also great at caving in skulls.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Toolbox.tools.0.label: box
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Crowbar.label: Wrench
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Crowbar.description: Not to be mistaken for a suspicious crowbar
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Crowbar.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Crowbar.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_FirstAid.label: Medkit
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_FirstAid.description: Automatically sorts medication, gauzes, salves, syringes and has an inbuilt health analyzer increasing healing efficiency.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_FirstAid.tools.0.label: box
